title: Iran Hits Back Across the Mideast, Targeting U.S. Bases and Allies
summary_full: Waves of retaliatory strikes were reported in Israel and across several Gulf countries on Saturday. The Emirati government said at least one person was killed from falling missile debris.
summary_public: Waves of retaliatory strikes were reported in Israel and across several Gulf countries on Saturday. The Emirati government said at least one person was killed from falling missile debris.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: retaliatory strikes were reported in Israel

IR.label: negative
